Name of AnimationFile.description: Give a NEW name to the motion

character_gender.description: Gender for which this motion is applicable (use 'any' for versatile motions)

character_age_group.description: Age group for which this motion is applicable (use 'any' for versatile motions)

character_body_type.description: Describe the style/direction of movement with an adjective

Overall Movement Description.description: Concisely describe the movement in English (up to 5 words)

Initial Pose.description: Starting pose (e.g., lying face down, lying on back, sitting, squatting, standing, etc.)

Final Pose.description: Ending pose (e.g., lying face down, lying on back, sitting, squatting, standing, etc.)

Appropriate Scene.description: Motion genre (everyday scene, conversation scene, tense scene, battle scene, etc.)

Loopable.description: Whether it can be played on repeat (loop playback) (Yes/No)

param_01.description: Item held in hand (e.g., ball, bat, none)

param_02.description: Intent conveyed by the movement (e.g., agreement, denial, sadness, command, greeting, joy, none (use 'none' if nothing applies))
